head.title: Heather Riegel To Wed in June

hedline.hl1: Heather Riegel To Wed in June

block.p: The engagement of Heather Knorr Riegel to Roger Conant Harper, the son of Wende C. Harper of Stamford, Conn., and Dr. Richard C. Harper of South Salem, N.Y., has been announced by her parents, Mr. and Mrs. Lawrence M. Riegel of New York. A June wedding is planned.

Miss Riegel, 29 years old, is the assistant to the director of publicity at Anne Klein & Company, the fashion house in New York. She graduated from the Spence School and Sweet Briar College and was a member of Junior Assembly in New York in 1979. Her father is an executive vice president of the Avrett, Free & Ginsberg advertising agency in New York.

The prospective bridegroom, 30, is an investment banker at Goldman, Sachs & Company in New York. He graduated cum laude from Middlebury College and received a law degree from Columbia University. His mother teaches English as a second language at the Stillmeadow School in Stamford. His father is the director of the professional education division at the University of Bridgeport.
